change 0 to -1 or -0 and try that ok the coords are right but the height i s wrong if u want it under ground try -1 or -0
[/quote]

I tried -0 and -1 in the correct spot and it still did not work.

or if u have team viewer pm pass and id and show me what your doing and ill help cause i need to see what your doing[/quote]

item.title: Adding global objects?[317]

@John459 wrote:

That is wrong. The 0 is the object’s rotation, not height.

item.title: Adding global objects?[317]
item.dc:creator: @Jtborth Jtborth
item.description:
@Jtborth wrote:

I’m currently trying to add a global object to a home i am making but it fails to work, this is the code i am using:

makeGlobalObject(3181, 9758, 2213, 0, 10);

The area i am trying to put it in is underground, so did i mess it up somehow? I put it by the other globalobjects codes.

Read full topic
